troubleshooting.title: Unexpected Page Break Before or After an Element

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: A page break is present before or after an element that has page-break-before or page-break-after (break-before or break-after) set to avoid.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: An empty element (for example p or shortdesc) is present before or after the element with the break set to avoid.
